item.title: BlackArsenal - PHP MVC E-commerce Site
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: BlackArsenal is a university e-commerce project developed in PHP with MVC architecture, specializing in fictional video game weapon sales to demonstrate back-end web development skills.
